::Slayer::

Slayer lands near Ignatius, still watching Necromancer fly off.

"What'd you do to piss him off?" he asks, frowning at the fellow 
Trainer.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> OK then I'm glad someone remembers what was happening. This should 
sum up an
> end to that battle.
> 
> The shots hit Necromancer like a tap on the shoulder. Being the same 
size as
> most of the gestaults had it's advantage. He stopped chaseing 
Ignatius and
> glared down at Zoe. "Brave attempt for an enemy, I respect that." he 
shouts
> down. Raising a mighty claw shakeing  one pointed finger toward her 
he
> smiles, "You can go now, I've had my fun."
> 
> The dragon turns away flying back toward the cave where the chase 
had begun.
> 
> Ignatius landed near Zoe gasping for breath. He'd pushed himself to 
his
> limits to avoid being lunch. "Lets head to base, you can follow me." 
The
> eagle again took flight heading north toward  the future sight of 
Cairo
> where he'd rest up until his strength returned.
